description: ......GURS.El campo de Gurs fue construido en 1939 para mantener detenidas a las combatientes que cruzaban la frontera escapando del terror del final de la guerra. Lo llamaron "camp des basques" ya que originalmente estaba previsto para albergar a prisioneras vascas â€”6.500 personas provenientes de Euskal Herria acabarÃ­an allÃ­â€”. Tras la caÃ­da del frente de Catalunya, llegarÃ­an revolucionarias de toda la penÃ­nsula.El gobierno francÃ©s construyÃ³ el campo a modo de cÃ¡rcel, con el objeto de aislar y detener a todos los sectores que podÃ­an poner en peligro el esfuerzo de guerra. Gurs se convirtiÃ³ asÃ­ en el forzoso hogar de anarquistas y comunistas, asÃ­ como tambiÃ©n de pacifistas, judias, presas por delitos comunes, alemanas y habitantes provenientes de los demas paises enemigos.DespuÃ©s, con la ocupaciÃ³n nazi de la denominada â€œFrancia de Vichyâ€, Gurs serÃ­a uno de los campos que se integraban al sistema de campos de trabajo y exterminio del III Reich. Afortunadamente muchas presas de la camada anterior habÃ­an podido salir o escaparse ante el cambio de autoridades, pero en su lugar miles de nuevas detenidas se sumaron. Gurs era una vÃ­a directa a Auschwitz.Tras la derrota de Hitler en la regiÃ³n francesa, el campo siguiÃ³ vivo y les sirviÃ³ a los vencedores para mantener presas a todas aquellas personas que habÃ­an luchado en la resistencia, pero que no se adecuaban al discurso oficial de â€œLa Resistenciaâ€. TambiÃ©n el poder mantuvo allÃ­ a quienes pretendÃ­an cruzar la frontera e iniciar una contraofensiva contra Franco. Demostrando asÃ­ una vez mÃ¡s, que la opresiÃ³n se viste de diferentes formas pero nos apuÃ±ala con el mismo cuchillo.Este disco va dedicado a todas esas personas que lucharon toda una vida y acabaron en los campos de concentraciÃ³n de la democracia y del fascismo. A quienes mantienen viva nuestra historia frente al relato de la burguesia y luchan a dÃ­a de hoy contra el Capital y contra el Estado en todas sus formas.A Cecilio Barrio y todas aquellas personas que sufrieron el horror de los campos y a aquellas que cayeron, luz eterna.:: euskGURS.Gurseko kontzentrazio-esparrua 1939an eraiki zuten, gerraren amaierako izutik ihesi muga zeharkatzen zuten borrokalariak atxilotuta edukitzeko. "Camp des basques" deitu zioten, jatorriz euskal presoak hartzeko aurreikusita baitzegoen, izan ere, Euskal Herritik etorritako 6.500 pertsonek han amaitu zuten. Gerora, Kataluniako frontea erori ondoren, penintsula osotik iraultzaileak bidaltzen hasi ziren.Frantziako gobernuak kartzela gisa eraiki zuen, gerra-ahalegina arriskuan jar zezaketen sektore guztiak isolatzeko eta atxilotzeko. Hala, Gurs anarkisten eta komunisten nahitaezko bizileku bihurtu zen, baita bakezale, judu, preso arrunt, alemaniar eta gainerako herrialde etsaietatik etorritako biztanleena ere.Gero, â€œVichyko Frantziaâ€ deiturikoaren okupazio naziarekin, Gurs III. Reicheko lan eta sarraski esparru sisteman integratu zen eremuetako bat izan zen. Zorionez, aurreko preso askok alde egin ahal izan zuten agintarien aldaketa aprobetxatuz, baina era berean, milaka atxilotu berri batu ziren. Gurs Auschwitzerako bide zuzena zen.Hitlerrek Frantziako eskualdean porrot egin ondoren, kontzentrazio-esparruak erabilgarri jarraitu zuen, eta erresistentzian borrokatu ziren baina â€œErresistentziaâ€ren diskurtso ofizialera egokitzen ez ziren pertsona guztiak preso edukitzeko balio izan zuen. Hauez gain, muga zeharkatu eta Francoren aurkako kontraerasoari ekin nahi ziotenak ere han mantendu zituen botereak. Horrela, zapalkuntzak, modu ezberdinetan jantzi arren, laban berarekin sastakatzen gaituela berriro ere frogatuz.Disko hau, bizitza osoan zehar borrokatu ziren eta demokraziaren eta faxismoaren kontzentrazio-esparruetan amaitu zuten pertsona horiei guztiei eskainia dago. Burgesiaren kontakizunaren aurrean, gure historia bizirik mantentzen dutenei; eta gaur egun kapitalaren eta Estatuaren aurka bere forma guztietan borrokatzen direnei.Cecilio Barriori, kontzentrazio-esparruetan izugarrikeria jasan zuten pertsona guztiei, eta erori zirenei, betiko argia.

tags: bass lee, dubby ambassah, earl zero, kenny knotts, pirates choice, reggae, roots reggae, roots reggae dub, dub, instrumental reggae, melodica, reggae, roberto sanchez, Bilbao
description: 2018 | PIRATES CHOICE RECORDINGS | PCR 12" 002> Produced by Dubby Ambassah> Recorded, Mixed & Co-produced by Roberto Sanchez> at A-Lone Ark Muzik studio> Backed by Dub Generation feat. Sly DunbarMelodica, Synths- Bass LeeDrums- Sly DunbarBass, Guitar, Keyboards & Organ- Roberto SanchezGuitar- Roberto BartolomeHorns- Jimmy C, Aratz Diez & Gorka FernandezPercussion- Dubby> Grab your copy:info@loneark.comReggae record label Pirates Choice Recordings from Bilbao, Spain, adds another great release to its for all roots reggae fans interesting catalogue. Itâ€™s produced by Dubby Ambassah and recorded, mixed & co-produced by Roberto SÃ¡nchez. This 12â€³ vinyl single features two vocal cuts, a melodica instrumental and a dub version, all utilizing the same riddim.Roots veteran Earl Zero, the original singer of â€œNone Shall Escape The Judgementâ€, gained new interest with his 2010 released album â€œAnd God Said To Manâ€. For that album he teamed up with Roberto SÃ¡nchez.Now they present a new collaboration on this 12â€³ vinyl single called â€œFire In The Cityâ€. Itâ€™s a truly great roots tune worth playing over and over again. Yet another proof of Roberto SÃ¡nchezâ€™s ability to get the best out of Jamaican reggae veterans.The vocal is extended with Bass Leeâ€™s wonderful melodica version â€“ a real treat for the eardrums. The B-side opens with Kenny Knotâ€™s glorious â€œLove & Gloryâ€ on the same riddim, It was actually released for the first time on the Pirates Choice label in 2008 as the A-side of a 10â€³ vinyl single. However, the mix included here differs from the 2008 version. To top off this 12â€³, the listener is treated to the excellent â€œJah Children Dubâ€.Itâ€™s becoming more and more clear that reggae music labelled â€˜Made in Spainâ€™ stands for high quality.info from:www.reggae-vibes.com/reviews/mini-review/2018/11/earl-zero-fire-in-the-city/

description: -----------------------------BIO-----------------------------The Bardulians are an instrumental jazz, funk, soul and rhythm & blues quartet formed at the beginning of 2012 in Bilbao, Spain. The band features musicians coming from bands like The Cherry Boppers, Akatz, Priscilla Band, The Longboards.At the end of 2018, the Green Cookie Records released the CD "Here We Go!". There can be found 7 instrumental songs composed by the band and an adaptation of a rhythm & blues classic. A recording in quintet format that features the guitar of Alfredo Romero from The Longboards. Recorded and produced by The Bardulians, mixed and mastered by Mike Mariconda.The quartet currently, 2019, is formed by: Joseba Negro (Hammond organ); Lando Stone (guitar and vocals); Iskander Vesga (baritone and tenor sax) & Argibel Euba (drums).-------------------------------The Bardulians es un cuarteto de jazz, funk, soul y rythm&blues instrumental que se forma a principios de 2012 en Bilbao. Sus mÃºsicos proceden de las bandas mÃ¡s representativas de la escena negra actual en Euskadi, como The Cherry Boppers, Akatz, Priscilla Band, Potato.Con su cadencia barduliana, The Bardulians consiguen hacer entrar en movimiento a todo aquel que este dispuesto a degustar su sonido, tambiÃ©n al que no. La cadencia barduliana, sinÃ³nimo de ritmo y fiesta, esta impulsada por una potente secciÃ³n rÃ­tmica que corre a cargo de Lando Stone (bajo) y Xavier Urrutikoetxea (baterÃ­a). El magnetismo que fluye en el bardulianismo lo transmite el hammond de Joseba Negro. La dulzura corre a cargo del saxo de Iskander Vesga.The Bardulians busca la inspiraciÃ³n en los aÃ±os 60 y principios de los 70, cuando la grabaciÃ³n analÃ³gica se encargaba de mostrar el sonido de la Ã©poca dorada del Soul. El ritmo barduliano consigue retrotraer hasta tiempos aÃ±ejos, donde las atmÃ³sferas eran suaves y el ritmo latino servÃ­a como ofrenda al baile y la diversiÃ³n.Sus mÃºsicos nos acercan a nuestra Ã©poca clÃ¡sicos de grandes artistas como Lou Donaldson, Ottis Redding, Horace Silver, Aretha Franklin, Gil Scott-Heron, Billy Preston y tambiÃ©n pequeÃ±os tributos a bandas como Sly & The Family Stone, The Meters e incluso las archiconocidas The Beatles o The RollinÂ´Stones.A finales de 2018 el sello Green Cookie records edita el CD "Here We Go!". Se grata de 7 temas instrumentales compuestos por la banda y una adaptaciÃ³n de un clÃ¡sico del rythm & blues. Una grabaciÃ³n en formato quinteto que cuenta con la guitarra de Alfredo Romero de The Longboards.Grabado y producido por The Bardulians, mezclado y masterizado por Mike Mariconda.Â¡Un sonido moderno para la joven Euskal Herria!El cuarteto en la actualidad, 2019, lo forman: Joseba Negro (Ã³rgano Hammond); Lando Stone (guitarra y voces); Iskander Vesga (saxo baritono y tenor); Argibel Euba (baterÃ­a).-----------------------------REVIEWS-----------------------------Staying with Green Cookie and indeed the Bardulians, these dudes recently dropped a killer set going by the name â€˜here we goâ€™ that had the label lushly gushing citing references as wide and far as Otis Redding, Gil Scott Heron and Sly and the Family Stone, all of which werenâ€™t to varying degrees, lost on us. However, we suggest you fast forward to the parting cut â€˜Atxabiribil Sunsetâ€™, an end of the evening slice of arresting lounge jazz acutely shimmered and seasoned in a sultry exotica trimming thatâ€™s teased with a sea faring lazy eyed lilt, quite exquisite by these ears.The Sunday Experience (3 Jan 2019)Groovy Baby !Si vous Ãªtes Ã  la recherche dâ€™un disque pour crÃ©er une ambiance Ã  la Austin Powers alors ce mini album (7titres) du groupe de Bilbao saura vous rÃ©galer ! Entre musique pour Party, Bande Originale pour film dâ€™espionnage sixties imaginaire, leur cocktail smooth Ã  base de Jazz Funk Soul & Rhythmâ€™nâ€™Blues fait un malheur !Orgue et saxophone, mais utilisÃ©s de faÃ§on purement Ã©lÃ©gante et lÃ©gÃ¨re, viennent driver les titres ici prÃ©sent, qui bÃ©nÃ©ficient chacun dâ€™une vraie personnalitÃ©.Super-class !Je ne suis pas le grand connaisseur de ce genre de disque ni le plus gros fan de disques totalement instrumentaux, mais je dois dire que celui-ci fait la distance idÃ©ale et que lâ€™attention portÃ©e Ã  chaque morceaux lui donne une pertinence et un intÃ©rÃªt qui ne faiblit jamais, alors que grandit lâ€™envie de le rÃ©Ã©couter !Voix De Garage Grenoble, France (10 Feb 2019)

description: Message is a band formed by a group of Roots Reggae lovers. It was originated in Bilbao, in November 2017, and is currently consolidated by musicians from Cantabria and Bizkaia.The band is inspired by the crudest, overwhelming and committed sounds of the golden age of Jamaican music; and the most renowned Roots Reggae and Dub musicians, engineers and producers of the 70s and early 80s.Its music joins together both original songs and versions of the "old good days". Roots Reggae and instrumental Dub played and mixed live and often accompanied by melodica or trombone melodies.At the moment the band is formed by 7 musicians, each one with its own musical trajectory. Therefore, take the opportunity and discover this new band:Drums: Roberto SÃ¡nchezBass: Gorka SÃ¡nchezGuitar: Roberto BartolomÃ©Piano, organ and trombone: Gorka FernÃ¡ndezPiano and melodica: Bass LeePercussion: Dubby AmbassahLive Engineer: Ibai AreitioContact:info@message-roots.comEspaÃ±olMessage es una banda formada por un grupo de amantes del Roots Reggae. NaciÃ³ en noviembre del 2017 en Bilbao y actualmente estÃ¡ consolidada por mÃºsicos de Cantabria y Bizkaia.La banda se inspira en los sonidos mÃ¡s crudos, contundentes y comprometidos de la Ã©poca dorada de la mÃºsica jamaicana; en los mÃºsicos y productores mÃ¡s reconocidos de aquellos aÃ±os del roots reggae y dub facturados durante la dÃ©cada de los 70 y primeros aÃ±os 80.Su mÃºsica estÃ¡ compuesta por canciones originales y versiones de la Ã©poca. Roots Reggae y Dub instrumental tocado y mezclado en directo y acompaÃ±ado frecuentemente por melodÃ­as de melÃ³dica o trombÃ³n.Actualmente la banda estÃ¡ formada por 7 mÃºsicos, cada uno con su propia trayectoria musical. Por tanto, no te quedes con las ganas y descubre esta nueva formaciÃ³n:Bateria: Roberto SÃ¡nchezBajo: Gorka SÃ¡nchezGuitarra: Roberto BartolomÃ©Piano, Ã³rgano y trombÃ³n: Gorka FernÃ¡ndezPiano y melÃ³dica: Bass LeePercusiÃ³n: Dubby AmbassahTÃ©cnico de directo: Ibai AreitioContacto:info@message-roots.comWether the references to Augustus Pablo were done on purpose or not, itâ€™s at least strikingâ€¦ First thereâ€™s the choice of the bandâ€™s name, Message, which might refer to one of Pabloâ€™s own record labels. The title of the instrumental piece with the melodica as lead instrument incorporates the word â€˜Eastâ€™, which could be a reference to Pabloâ€™s meditative and mournful â€˜Far Eastâ€™ sound and titles of Pablo tunes like â€œEast Of The River Nileâ€, â€œFar Eastâ€, â€œEast Man Soundâ€, â€œRockers Come Eastâ€ and â€˜East Windâ€.Message is a new band formed by a group of Roots Reggae lovers in November 2017 in Bilbao, Spain, which is currently consolidated by musicians from Cantabria and Bizkala. At the moment the band consists of the esteemed Roberto SÃ¡nchez (drums), Gorka SÃ¡nchez (bass), Roberto BartolomÃ© (guitar), Gorka FernÃ¡ndez (piano, organ & trombone), Bass Lee (piano & melodica) and the mighty Dub Ambassah (percussion). During live shows they are accompanied by their engineer Ibai Areitio. The band also has its own record label called Messengers. Messageâ€™s music is inspired by the crudest, overwhelming and comitted sounds of the golden age of Jamaicaâ€™s popular music and the most renowned Roots Reggae musicians, engineers and producers of the â€™70s and early â€™80s.The bandâ€™s self-produced debut single (on 7â€³ vinyl) called â€œEast Boundâ€ has been recorded during a live session at A-lone Ark Muzik Studio, where it was mixed by the inescapable Roberto SÃ¡nchez. The latter also manipulated the knobs in order to create â€œEast Bound Dubâ€, the worthwhile dub version on the flipside. The vibes are very nice and so is the expertly played riddim! To hear a well blown melodica over a thoroughly appealing riddim is simply candy for the ears and thus a joy to hear.Itâ€™s really good to notice that the Message band is able to keep the Pablo melodica tradition going.By Mr. T reggae-vibes:www.reggae-vibes.com/reviews/mini-review/2019/07/message-east-bound/â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜…A-LONE PRODUCTIONS â˜… A-LONE ARK MUZIK STUDIOLabel & Studio based in Santander, Spain.Recordings / Mixing / Productions / Mastering / DistributionBooking - Live Dub Mix show / Lone Ark Riddim Force live band showOrder your A-Lone LP/CD/12''/10''/7'' copiesContact:info@loneark.comwww.loneark.comfacebook.com/aloneproductions/instagram.com/lone_ark/youtube.com/user/loneark77â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜… â˜…

tags: reggae, bass lee, dub, melodica, melodica dub, melodica reggae, one drop, rocksteady, roots, ska, Santander
description: Produced by: Bass LeeMixed by: Roberto SÃ¡nchez / Bass LeeTracks 4, 8 mixed by: RubÃ©n G. Mateos / Roberto SÃ¡nchezAll Dub mixes by: Roberto SÃ¡nchezArtwork by: Mario RiveraBLM-CD-001 [BLM009]2020MUSICIANS:Drum Programming: Bass LeeBass: Roberto SÃ¡nchez / Gorka SÃ¡nchez (4, 8)All Keys, Xylophone, Melodica: Bass LeeGuitars: Borja GoÃ±i / Gamba (4, 8)Percussion: Roberto SÃ¡nchez / Antton Ugarte (4, 8)Kette Drum: Bass LeeContact and Distribution:bassleemusic@gmail.comBASS LEEBass Lee Music, an independent label from Bilbao, Spain founded by reggae & dub producer and musician Bass Lee, issued its very first production in February 2016, the digitally released â€œOur Weapon Is Loveâ€ by singer George Palmer, which came across the â€œSleng Tengâ€ riddim inna different stylee.The labelâ€™s initial release was followed by 7 other releases from artists like Juza, King Jahvy, Sistah Lore, Sista Kata, Antxon Sagardui, David Fendah, and Gamba.Apart from being a producer, Bass Lee has recorded and released records in vinyl and digital format and is a member of the Spanish roots reggae band named Message, in which he plays keys and melodica.MELODICA SHOWCASEAnd now thereâ€™s the first self produced melodica album by Bass Lee and the labelâ€™s first release on CD entitled â€œInna One Drop Styleâ€, which unsurprisingly is subtitled â€˜Melodica Showcaseâ€™.The album consists of 4 instrumental cuts and 4 dub versions mixed by Roberto SÃ¡nchez at A-Lone Ark Muzik Studio. The music on this album pays tribute to the 1970s, the golden era of Jamaican roots reggae music, and to the roots â€˜one dropâ€™ riddims of that decade.AUGUSTUS PABLOThe melodica has been an established lead instrument in reggae music since the release of â€œIggy Iggyâ€â€, the 1971 debut single of Horace Swaby aka Augustus Pablo.Combining the major elements of the piano and wind instruments, the humble plastic keyboard with a, mouthpiece serves mainly as a teaching tool in the rest of the world, but in reggae, inspired by innovative originator Augustus Pablo, it has become a cornerstone of the tradition. The soft, pleasing sound of his melodica over heavy bass riddims created a new and exciting sound in reggae music.After Augustus Pablo, melodica albums were also delivered by musicians such as Joe White, Bobby Kalphat, Pablove Black, Hughie Izachaar, Dr Pablo, and, of course, the son of the legendary Augustus Pablo, Addis Pablo.With the release of his â€˜Melodica Showcaseâ€™, â€œInna One Drop Styleâ€, also Bass Lee can be added to that list of fine melodica players.VIBRANTFor his debut album Bass Lee has collaborated with one of the most dependable people in the entire reggae genre these days, the highly respected Roberto SÃ¡nchez.If youâ€™ve followed roots reggae music in the modern era, and especially the production works with a strong reference to the heydays of roots reggae, you have to be aware of this Spanish musician, mixing engineer and producer. His name, alone, attached to a project is enough to peak the interest as one can always expect an album full of familiar sounds which is simply hard to put down. â€œInna One Drop Styleâ€ is both an instrumental release and a dub release.Each instrumental done by Bass Lee gets Roberto SÃ¡nchezâ€™s dub treatment. After the intro vocals by Juza, the title track and album opener â€œInna One Drop Styleâ€ is actually the gorgeous start of a vibrant album that has some great melodies to fulljoy. Even though the tracks are laidback on the surface, thereâ€™s also a detailed level of musicianship and intensity to be heard.Unfortunately the total playing time of this album (28m:26s) is a bit short, but wasnâ€™t that the case with most albums from back in the day?âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡A-LONE PRODUCTIONS âœ‡ A-LONE ARK MUZIK STUDIOLabel & Studio based in Santander, Spain.ðŸŽ›ï¸ Recording / Mixing / ProductionsðŸŽšï¸ Booking - Live Dub Mix show / Lone Ark live band showðŸ’¿ Order your A-Lone LP/CD/12''/10''/7'' copiesâœ‰ï¸ contact:info@loneark.comðŸ“˜facebook.com/aloneproductions/ðŸ“·instagram.com/lone_ark/ðŸŽ¥youtube.com/user/loneark77âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡ âœ‡

artist_name: Willi Williams & Lone Ark Riddim Force
tags: bass lee, booker gee, junior g, lone ark, ras telford, reggae, roots reggae, roots reggae dub, willi williams, dub, instrumental reggae, melodica, reggae, roberto sanchez, Bilbao
description: WILLI WILLIAMS - GLORY TO THE KING 'Showcase' LP & CD6 VOCALS & 6 INSTRUTHMENTALS> Lyrics Written By Wilbert Keith Williams> Produced, Recorded and Mixed by Roberto SÃ¡nchez> At A-Lone Ark Muzik Studio - Santander> Mastered At Euridia by Ibon Larrucea - Bilbao> Musically Arranged And Directed By Roberto SÃ¡nchez> Executive Producers: Santiago Villaverde and Roberto SÃ¡nchez> Artwork by Cholo> Photo by Laia Buira> Players Of Instruments: LONE ARK RIDDIM FORCERoberto SÃ¡nchez - Drums, Bass, Piano, Organ, Guitars, Rhodes and Backing VocalsReuben 'Ras' Telford - Solina Strings, Elka Clavi and Strings and MelodicaMathias Liengme - Moog and ClavinetBooker Gee - Lead Organ on FaithBass Lee - Melodica on Deep WithinGorka 'Junior G' FernÃ¡ndez - Trumpet and TromboneSaioa JorrÃ­n - Alto Sax and FluteShanti Yalah - PercussionPipe Hero - Percussion and SynareDubby Ambassah - PercussionTRUTH LABELA-LONE PRODUCTIONS 2020- Â· -ARMAGEDDON TIMEJust mention the song â€œArmageddon Timeâ€ to a reggae fan and most likely he/she will come up with the name Willi Williams. Recorded with the Sound Dimension at the legendary Studio One across the original instrumental â€œReal Rockâ€, this roots scorcher has become one of reggaeâ€™s signature tunes and thus firmly established Willi Williamsâ€™ name on the reggae map.Furthermore it also brought him to a wider audience as it was successfully covered by Londonâ€™s premier punk band The Clash in the early â€™80s. Two years earlier Willi Williams had delivered his outstanding debut album â€œMessenger Manâ€ on the Jah Muzik label.Throughout the â€™80s and â€™90s, the singer continued to make records and although some of them were extremely good â€“ like for example the Jah Shaka produced set â€œNatty With A Causeâ€ â€“ he wasnâ€™t able to outmatch or even match the success of his Studio One classic.LONG-AWAITEDWilli Williamsâ€™ reflective, gentle vocal style, which owes as much to soul and jazz styles as to roots, is fully displayed on this subtle new album. It is that unique singing that strongly appeals to all roots reggae fans. And, whenever Roberto SÃ¡nchez and the Lone Ark Riddim Force are involved in a project, itâ€™s a real pleasure to hear reggae music that recalls very fond memories of a time when it was a deeply inspired and startlingly original form.Willi Williams long-awaited â€œGlory To The Kingâ€, with its six vocal cuts and six instrumentals with a lead musician coming to the fore, is no exception.7â€³ SINGLESEarlier this year we already got a foretaste of what to expect from this Willi Williams album, when the 7â€³ singles â€œDonâ€™t Show Offâ€ and â€œSee It Dehâ€ hit the streets. â€œDonÂ´t Show Offâ€ opens this set, affirming he still has that kind of tone and phrasing that makes you feel a higher level.Itâ€™s a great roots tune, worth hearing over and over again. And then thereâ€™s â€œSee It Dehâ€, a stellar song underpinned by a remake of the riddim Roberto SÃ¡nchez composed for Shanti YalahÂ´s song â€œCreation, a riddim done inna Rockers stylee.VOCAL CUTSRemain four brand new, never before heard vocal cuts. The first one, the sublime spiritual song â€œThereâ€™s A Placeâ€, stands for high quality roots reggae music. Itâ€™s a modern roots anthem stamped with class all over, not in the least due to the enchanting riddim that underpins this standout track. The tempo and vibrancy of the vibes takes a slight step back when the title track, the straight forward praising tune â€œGlory To The Kingâ€, drops in.Ultimately, as the song develops, itâ€™s a fully satisfying classically vibed effort. Musically â€œWhatâ€™s Going Onâ€ goes into a different direction. Itâ€™s a moving, soulful reality tune that deals with the refugee crisis in the world.The last of the four previously unheard tunes, â€œHere We Areâ€, is an excellent track and definitely one of the albumâ€™s most outstanding efforts.INSTRUMENTALSInstead of adding dub versions to Willi Williamsâ€™ vocal cuts, whatâ€™s usually done, they are now accompanied by instrumentals with each time a different musician being the lead instrumentalist. This turns out to be an appealing concept with some noteworthy material to fuljoy.Ras Telford nicely plays the melodica on â€œThe Nansa Heritageâ€ and â€œGlory To Himâ€, while Bass Lee, who recently released his album â€œInna One Drop Style â€“ Melodica Showcaseâ€, does the same on the gorgeous â€œDeep Withinâ€. Junior G takes the lead with his trombone on two instrumental gems, â€œIrationâ€ and â€œBlow Your Hornâ€. An also the organ as lead instrument, played by Booker Gee on â€œFaithâ€, is present here.

artist_name: Ilia Belorukov, Miguel A. GarcÃ­a, Dmitry Krotevich, Kurt Liedwart, Xavier Lopez
tags: experimental, electroacoustic, electronic, improvised music, noise, Bilbao
description: In June 2013 Xavier Lopez (ppooll) from France and Miguel A. Garcia from Spain (no input mixing board, electronics) came to Moscow and Saint Petersburg. They played at Noise & Fury festival where they met Kurt Liedwart (ppooll, supercollider) and Dmitry Krotevich (electronics) duo. In Saint-Petersburg both duos played in Experimental Sound Gallery and the next day Ilia Belorukov (alto saxophone, objects) joined them at the studio. The new born quintet recorded this release where the musicians tried to eschew traditional electroacoustic sound and introduce new elements and ways of playing.Ilia Belorukov // alto saxophone, electronicsMiguel A. Garcia // no-input mixing board, electronicsDmitry Krotevich // electronicsKurt Liedwart // ppooll, objects, electronicsXavier Lopez // ppooll

description: (castellano)LIVELÃœLA, trabajo, creatividad y mÃ¡s atrevimiento que nunca en su nuevo EP digital â€œDREAM AWAYâ€En alguna ocasiÃ³n se ha aplicado el calificativo de "incansable" para definir a MIGUEL IBARRETXE, alma mater de LIVELÃœLA. Y para demostrar lo acertado del tÃ©rmino, LIVELÃœLA nos sorprende de nuevo con una nueva producciÃ³n en forma de EP digital.Bajo el tÃ­tulo genÃ©rico de "DREAM AWAY REMIXES", encontramos nada menos que tres nuevas visiones de "DREAM AWAY", pieza que ya se incluye, aunque no en estas versiones, en el album "BLUE SUN", tres nuevos remixes que van desde la versiÃ³n mÃ¡s dance a la mÃ¡s ambient.LIVELÃœLA :remezcla a SUSHI Y WASABIy revisita a NICK DRAKEEl nuevo EP digital incluye otros dos temas de LIVELÃœLA hasta ahora inÃ©ditos: "UNDER THE RAIN" y "RAINDROPS ON MY WINDOW". Pero la capacidad productiva de LIVELÃœLA no termina ahi, aÃºn hay mÃ¡s. Una versiÃ³n "DLM Breathe Mix" de "VEN", canciÃ³n del grupo SUSHI Y WASABI incluÃ­da en su Ã¡lbum de debut. Hay que apuntar que SUSHI Y WASABI han sido una de las gratas sorpresas de la escena indie en 2012. MÃ¡s info de SUSHI Y WASABI en:www.florynatarecords.comY por Ãºltimo "DREAM AWAY REMIXES" incluye una Ãºltima sorpresa, se trata de una versiÃ³n de "KNOW", una de las canciones que NICK DRAKE incluyÃ³ en su Ãºltimo disco "Pink Moon" de 1972. Nick Drake, pese a su corta producciÃ³n, solo tres discos, y su prematura muerte a los 26 aÃ±os, estÃ¡ considerado como "mÃºsico de culto", muchos son los artistas que le citan como punto de referencia y nombres como Elthon John o Norah Jones han versioneado sus canciones. Ahora LIVELÃœLA se une a esa lista.De LIVELÃœLA estÃ¡n disponibles su larga duraciÃ³n â€œBlue Sunâ€ y sus e.p. digitales â€œBackâ€, â€œI Tryâ€ y ahora este â€œDream Awayâ€. Los discos exclusivamente digitales puede conseguirse en las mejores tiendas online, y tambien en su BandCamp  (livelula.bandcamp.com)_________________(euskera)LIVELÃœLA, lana, sormena eta inoiz baino ausardi gehiago bere EP â€œDREAM AWAYâ€ berrian.Noizbait "nekaezina" izena eman zaio MIGUEL IBARRETXE-ri, LIVELÃœLA-ren arima definitzeko. Eta hau frogatzeko, LIVELÃœLA-k berriro ustekabean harrapatzen gaitu EP digital berri honekin. "DREAM AWAY remixes" titulu generikoaren azpian, 3 bihirnahaste berriak aurkitzen ditugu; "BLUE SUNâ€ diskan aurki daitekeen pieza, nahiz eta ez, bertsio hauetan bezala.LIVELÃœLA : â€œSUSHI Y WASABIâ€-ren birnahastea eta â€œNICK DRAKEâ€-n bertsioaEP digital berriak LIVELÃœLA-k orain arte argitaragabeko beste bi abesti dakartza: "UNDER THE RAIN" eta "RAIN DROPS ON MY WINDOW". Baina LIVELÃœLA-ren ahalmen emankorra ez da han amaitzen, oraindik gehiago dago eta. -DLM breathe mix- ezizenarekin â€œVenâ€ SUSHI y WASABI taldearen bertsio bat, bere lehenbiziko diskan agertzen dena. Esan beharra dago SUSHI y WASABI-k 2012an Indie musika arloan ezuste atseginen bat izan dela. SUSHI y WASABI-ren informazio gehiagorako:www.florynatarecords.comEta "DREAM AWAY remixes" azken ezustea sartzen du, "KNOW" abestiaren bertsio bat; NICK DRAKE-k "Pink Moon" 1972ko bere azken diskotik aterata. Bere ekoizpen motza izan arren, hiru disko atera zituen, eta 26 urteetako bere heriotza goiztiarra, "kultu-musikari" bezala kontuan hartuta dago, asko dira erreferentzia-puntua hartu dituztenak. Haien artean: Elthon John-ek edo Norah Jones-ek Nick Drake-n kantak bertsionatu dituztenak dira. Orain LIVELÃœLA daukagu haien artean.LIVELÃœLA-ko daukagu "Blue Sun" izeneko diska eta beren e.p. digitalak: "Back", "I try" eta orain â€œDream awayâ€. Digitalak diren diskak, bakarrik interneteko online denda onenetan aurki daitezke._________________(english)LIVELÃœLA, work, creativity and more audacity than ever in their new digital EP "Dream Away"On occasion applied the adjective "indefatigable" to define IBARRETXE MIGUEL, LIVELÃœLA alma mater. And to prove the correctness of the term, LIVELÃœLA surprises us again with a new production in the form of digital EP.Under the generic title of "DREAM AWAY REMIXES" we find no less than three new visions of "Dream Away", a piece that is already included, but not in these versions, the album "Blue Sun", three new remixes ranging from the dance version to the more ambient.LIVELÃœLA: SUSHI AND WASABI remixes - NICK DRAKE and revisitsThe new digital EP includes two issues LIVELÃœLA previously unpublished: "Under the Rain" and "Raindrops on my window." But LIVELÃœLA productive capacity does not end there, there's more. A version "DLM Breathe Mix" of "VEN", song by WASABI SUSHI AND inclosed on their debut album. It should be noted that WASABI SUSHI AND have been one of the pleasant surprises of the indie scene in 2012. More info SUSHI Y WASABI:www.florynatarecords.comAnd finally "DREAM AWAY REMIXES" includes a final surprise, this is a version of "KNOW", one of the songs included NICK DRAKE on his latest album "Pink Moon" in 1972. Nick Drake, even at its small production, only three albums, and his untimely death at age 26, is considered "cult musician", there are many artists cite him as a point of reference and names like Elton John and Norah Jones their songs have versioning. LIVELÃœLA now joins that list.From LIVELÃœLA available long life "Blue Sun" and ep digital "Back", "I Try" and now this "Dream Away". Digital discs can only be achieved in the best online stores._________________

description: Fluzzahhh is an attempt at experimentation and approach with eminent presence of the guitar as the main instrument, whose doubtful loudness and lack of brightness give a texture sometimes indeterminate as a result of a multitrack recording and radically processed to distort the possibility of recognition.Although the guitar ultimately appears dominant in the interpretation completely improvised in real time that supposes the final result of this audible cut that by repetitive can be relaxing.The interpretation is born from a series of sounds made to generate tensions and make it impossible to perceive a real tonic where to rest, as expected in any proposal made in a traditional way.It is born with an intention to stress the listener and thus keep him alert, and ends in a paradox of relaxing textures that could well be classifiedlike Not Wave.The recording made in multitrack mode during improvisation is a real interpretation challenge because it provides a degree of additional complexity to the piece and it is precisely for that rhythmic reason that sometimes it is properly filled but sometimes in contrast to logic It does not fit and makes it very special to active listening.The attractiveness of arrhythmia together with the author's initial intentions is disconcerting, because his proposal sometimes when not fulfilled generates unease and an uneasiness that breaks with the preconceived sound canvas.This is a recording made in a single, uninterrupted session, of approximately twenty-seven minutes long, totally improvised and random, with assembly of a specific set of its own, made for a single theme and without editing.The cuts have been made for a mere matter of space available for publication.Recorded in Bilbao on a winter day in an interior space devoid of natural light intentionally, in order to favor instrospection and the concentration.Fluzzahhh es un intento de experimentaciÃ³n y acercamiento con presencia eminente de la guitarra como instrumento principal, cuya dudosa sonoridad y falta de brillo otorgan una textura a veces indeterminada como resultado de una grabaciÃ³n realizada en multipista y procesada de manera radical para desvirtuar la posibilidad de su reconocimiento.Aunque la guitarra en Ãºltima instancia aparece dominante en la interpretaciÃ³n totalmente improvisada en tiempo real que supone el resultado final de este corte audible que por repetitivo puede resultar hasta relajante.La interpretaciÃ³n nace a partir de una serie de sonidos realizados para generar tensiones e imposibilitar la percepciÃ³n de una tÃ³nica realdonde poder descansar, como se espera en cualquier propuesta realizada de manera tradicional.Nace con una intenciÃ³n de tensionar al oyente y asÃ­ mantenerle alerta, y termina en una paradoja de texturas relajantes que bien podrÃ­an clasificarse como no wave.La grabaciÃ³n realizada en modo multipista durante la improvisaciÃ³n, resulta un verdadero reto de interpretaciÃ³n porque aporta un grado decomplejidad adicional a la pieza y es precisamente por ese motivo ritmico que a veces se empasta debidamente pero otras en contraposiciÃ³n a la lÃ³gica no encaja y lo hace muy especial a la escucha activa.El atractivo de la arritmia unida a las intenciones iniciales del autor resultan desconcertantes, porque su propuesta a veces al no cumplirse genera desasosiego y una intranquilidad que rompe con el lienzo sonoro preconcebido.Se trata de una grabaciÃ³n realizada en una Ãºnica sesiÃ³n,ininterrumpida, de aproximadamente veintisiete minutos de duraciÃ³n, totalmente improvisada y aleatoria, con montaje de un set especÃ­fico propio,realizado para un sÃ³lo tema y sin editar.Los cortes, se han hecho por una mera cuestiÃ³n de espacio disponible para su publicaciÃ³n.Grabado en Bilbao en un dÃ­a de invierno en un espacio interior carente de luz natural de manera intencionada, con objeto de favorecer la introspecciÃ³n y la concentraciÃ³n.
